message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and benefits, I estimate its value to be well above $12000. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15000. This includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive consultation package to ensure seamless integration into your workflow. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you have any questions. I look forward to potentially working with you.
